block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: DAC ADC plot DAC set value vs ADC reading
10 repeat 10 times with different color to show the noise
2 100UF 10nF Try 2 run of this code 1st run, without capacitor on power supply line 2nd run, add 100UF and 10nF and try again The readings from 2nd run should be a lot cleaner than the 1st run
